# Christopher Maymon, PhD

**Experimental Psychologist | Data Analyst | VR Developer**

I am a Lecturer at Victoria University of Wellington and a research consultant specializing in the intersection of **human behavior** and **virtual environments**.

My work bridges the gap between rigorous academic research and technical implementation. Whether you need advanced statistical modeling, a custom VR environment for behavioral testing, or guidance on experimental design, I provide end-to-end consulting services.

[Hire Me for Consulting](contact.qmd){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} [View Publications](publications.qmd){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-lg role="button"}
